smells.name: PackageNaming
smells.description: Package names should match the naming convention set in the configuration.

instances.message: Package name should match the pattern: ^[a-z]+(\.[a-z][a-z0-9]*)*$
Package name should match the pattern: ^[a-z]+(\.[a-z][a-z0-9]*)*$
Package name should match the pattern: ^[a-z]+(\.[a-z][a-z0-9]*)*$

smells.name: ConstructorParameterNaming
smells.description: Constructor parameter names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Constructor private parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: mainActivity.getSystemService(Context.USAGE_STATS_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to UsageStatsManager.
context.getSystemService(Context.APP_OPS_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to AppOpsManager.
getSystemService(Context.SEARCH_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to SearchManager.
menu.findItem(R.id.action_search).actionView cannot be safely cast to SearchView.
listView.layoutManager cannot be safely cast to LinearLayoutManager.
listView.layoutManager cannot be safely cast to LinearLayoutManager.
package_info.applicationInfo.loadLabel(packageManager) cannot be safely cast to String.

smells.name: LateinitUsage
smells.description: Usage of lateinit detected. Using lateinit for property initialization is error prone, try using constructor injection or delegation.

instances.message: Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.

smells.name: UnconditionalJumpStatementInLoop
smells.description: An unconditional jump statement in a loop is useless. The loop itself is only executed once.

instances.message: This loop contains an unconditional jump expression which essentially renders it useless as it will exit the loop during the first iteration.

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType
smells.description: It will throw a NullPointerException at runtime if your nullable value is null.

instances.message: Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.
Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.

smells.name: NewLineAtEndOfFile
smells.description: Checks whether files end with a line separator.

instances.message: The file HelperFunctions.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file GeneralUI.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file MainActivity.kt is not ending with a new line.

smells.name: NoTabs
smells.description: Checks if tabs are used in Kotlin files.

smells.name: MaxLineLength
smells.description: Line detected that is longer than the defined maximum line length in the code style.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of AppsListAdapter.

smells.name: LoopWithTooManyJumpStatements
smells.description: The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.

instances.message: The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: ExpressionBodySyntax
smells.description: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

instances.message: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

smells.name: MandatoryBracesIfStatements
smells.description: Multi-line if statement was found that does not have braces. These should be added to improve readability.

instances.message: Multi-line if statement was found that does not have braces. These should be added to improve readability.
